original: @#/_/dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug mkha' la
analyzed: @#/_/dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug mkha' la
translated: Glorious Lokeshvara in the Sky

original: gshegs pa'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa
analyzed: gshegs pa'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa
translated: The Extensive Sādhana of the Glorious Lokanātha Moving in the Sky

original: bzhugs so// @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shri kha sar pa na lo ke shwa ra sa d+ha na bsti bsti /
analyzed: bzhugs so// @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shri kha sar pa na lo ke shwa ra sa d+ha na bsti bsti /
translated: In Sanskrit: Śrī Khasarpana Lokkeśvara Sādhana

original: bod skad du/_dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug mkha' la gshegs pa'i sgrub thabs
analyzed: bod skad du/_dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug mkha' la gshegs pa'i sgrub thabs
translated: In Tibetan: The Extensive Sādhana of the Glorious Lokanātha Moving in the Sky

original: rgyas pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can la
analyzed: rgyas pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can la
translated: Homage to the noble Avalokiteśvara, the one with great compassion.

original: phyag 'tshhal lo/_/mkhar gshegs mgon po sdug bsngal ba'i/_/mgon du gyur
analyzed: phyag 'tshhal lo/_/mkhar gshegs mgon po sdug bsngal ba'i/_/mgon du gyur
translated: I pay homage to the protector who moves in the sky, the protector of those suffering,🔽and will write a slightly extensive [sādhana]

original: la phyag 'tshhal te/_/de yi sgrub thabs bsdus pa las/_/cung zad rgyas par bri🔽bar bya/_/dang por re shig sngags pas lag pa dang rkang pa la sogs pa chu yis
analyzed: la phyag 'tshhal te/_/de yi sgrub thabs bsdus pa las/_/cung zad rgyas par bri bar bya/_/dang por re shig sngags pas lag pa dang rkang pa la sogs pa chu yis
translated: from the concise sādhana of him.

original: rab tu bkrus te mchog tu gtshang bar gyur nas skye bo dang bral ba'i ri'i phug gam/
analyzed: rab tu bkrus te mchog tu gtshang bar gyur nas skye bo dang bral ba'i ri'i phug gam/
translated: First, the mantrin should thoroughly wash their hands, feet, and so forth with water, and having become extremely pure, in a place free of people, in a mountain cave,

original: yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas gtshang mar 'jam pa'i stan gyi steng du 'dug
analyzed: yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas gtshang mar 'jam pa'i stan gyi steng du 'dug
translated: or in a completely pure place that is pleasing to the mind, sit on a soft seat.

original: pas rang gi snying khar dbyangs dang po yongs su gyur pa'i mtshhan mor byed pa'i
analyzed: pas rang gi snying khar dbyangs dang po yongs su gyur pa'i mtshhan mor byed pa'i
translated: The first vowel is transformed into a moon disc at your heart.

original: dkyil 'khor rnyog pa dang bral ba sems kyis bltas te/_de'i dbus su ston
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rnyog pa dang bral ba sems kyis bltas te/_de'i dbus su ston
translated: Look at it with your mind, and in its center visualize a syllable

original: kha'i zla ba brgya phrag gcig tu byas pa'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba ltar rab tu gsal
analyzed: kha'i zla ba brgya phrag gcig tu byas pa'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba ltar rab tu gsal
translated: .  It is very clear, like a garland of light rays from a hundred full moons.

original: /_/   dpal rten dbang phyug mkha' la gshegs pa'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa bzhugs so
analyzed: /_/   dpal rten dbang phyug mkha' la gshegs pa'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa bzhugs so
translated: The Extensive Sādhana of Śrī Heruka Cakrasaṃvara

original: ba'i ba'i yig gi sa bon blta bar bya'o/_/de nas hrih_yig sa bon las byung ba'i
analyzed: ba'i ba'i yig gi sa bon blta bar bya'o/_/de nas hrih_yig sa bon las byung ba'i
translated: You should look at the seed syllable of the letter A. Then, from the seed syllable HRĪḤ,🔽light rays radiate in the form of hooks,

original: 'od zer 'gro ba rmongs pa'i mun pa'i tshhogs 'joms par byed pa lcags kyu'i
analyzed: 'od zer 'gro ba rmongs pa'i mun pa'i tshhogs 'joms par byed pa lcags kyu'i
translated: destroying the mass of darkness of delusion in beings.

original: rnam pa can 'phros pa rnams kyi phyogs bcur gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
analyzed: rnam pa can 'phros pa rnams kyi phyogs bcur gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
translated: Having illuminated the infinite world systems in the ten directions,

original: mtha' yas pa rab tu gsal bar byas nas de rnams na bzhugs pa'i bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' grangs med cing tshhad med pa rnams nam
analyzed: mtha' yas pa rab tu gsal bar byas nas de rnams na bzhugs pa'i bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' grangs med cing tshhad med pa rnams nam
translated: countless and immeasurable gurus, buddhas, and bodhisattvas dwelling there

original: mkha'i phyogs su spyan drangs nas bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o/_/phyi nas nam
analyzed: mkha'i phyogs su spyan drangs nas bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o/_/phyi nas nam
translated: Then, having invited them into the sky, one should request them to remain there.

original: mkha'i phyogs na bzhugs pa mchog gi thugs rje can bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la me tog dang bdug spos dang /_mar me dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang chos gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshhan🔽dang ba dan la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa phul du byung ba dang ldan pa bsgrubs
analyzed: mkha'i phyogs na bzhugs pa mchog gi thugs rje can bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la me tog dang bdug spos dang /_mar me dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang chos gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshhan dang ba dan la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa phul du byung ba dang ldan pa bsgrubs
translated: Then, having made offerings to those compassionate supreme ones, the gurus, buddhas, and bodhisattvas who are dwelling in the sky, with offerings of flowers, incense, lamps, perfume, garlands, ointments, powders, Dharma robes, parasols, victory banners,🔽and standards, and so forth, and having made the most excellent offerings, one should then confess one’s sins.🔽Whatever I have done,

original: nas/_sdig pa bshags par bya ste/_gang cung zad skye ba 'di'am skye ba
analyzed: nas/_sdig pa bshags par bya ste/_gang cung zad skye ba 'di'am skye ba
translated: or caused to be done,🔽or have rejoiced in being done,🔽in this life or others,🔽in beginningless cyclic existence,

original: gzhan rnams su thog ma med pa'i 'khor bar kun nas 'khor ba bdag gis sdig🔽pa'i las lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bgyis pa dang bgyid du stshal ba dang bgyid
analyzed: gzhan rnams su thog ma med pa'i 'khor bar kun nas 'khor ba bdag gis sdig pa'i las lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bgyis pa dang bgyid du stshal ba dang bgyid
translated: I confess all my vile actions

original: bzhin pa dang rjes su yi rang ba bgyis pa de thams cad bcom ldan 'das 'jig
analyzed: bzhin pa dang rjes su yi rang ba bgyis pa de thams cad bcom ldan 'das 'jig
translated: to the Blessed One.

original: rten gsum gyi dga' ston chen po bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
analyzed: rten gsum gyi dga' ston chen po bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
translated: In the presence of the gurus, the buddhas, and the bodhisattvas, I confess each and every one of them.

original: dpa' rnams kyi spyan sngar so sor gshags par bgyi'o zhes pa'i cho ga 'dis
analyzed: dpa' rnams kyi spyan sngar so sor gshags par bgyi'o zhes pa'i cho ga 'dis
translated: With this ritual of confession,

original: bshags shing slar mi byed par sdom pa bzung nas/_bsod nams la rjes su🔽yid rang bar bya'o/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang de'i sras byang chub sems🔽dpa' rnams dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams dang khams gsum gyi
analyzed: bshags shing slar mi byed par sdom pa bzung nas/_bsod nams la rjes su yid rang bar bya'o/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang de'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams dang khams gsum gyi
translated: confess your sins and take the vow not to commit them again.🔽Rejoice in the merit of others.🔽Rejoice in the virtue of the perfect buddhas, their bodhisattva

original: khongs nas gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba gang yin pa de thams cad la
analyzed: khongs nas gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba gang yin pa de thams cad la
translated: children, the pratyekabuddhas, the shravakas, and all sentient beings🔽in the three realms.

original: rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o zhes so/_/de'i rjes su dkon mchog gsum la skyabs
analyzed: rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o zhes so/_/de'i rjes su dkon mchog gsum la skyabs
translated: After that, go for refuge to the Three Jewels.

original: su 'gro ba bya ste/_rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/
analyzed: su 'gro ba bya ste/_rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/
translated: I go for refuge to the Buddha, the best of all human beings.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/tshhogs
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/tshhogs
translated: I go for refuge to the Dharma, the best of all that is free from🔽attachment.

original: rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o ces so/_/de nas lam la brten
analyzed: rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o ces so/_/de nas lam la brten
translated: Then, one should rely on the path:

original: par bya ste/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i lam de bdag gis brten
analyzed: par bya ste/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i lam de bdag gis brten
translated: I will rely on the path taught by the perfect Buddha,🔽and not on any other.

original: par bgyi zhing gzhan ma yin no ces pa'o/_/de'i rjes su gsol ba gdab par bya
analyzed: par bgyi zhing gzhan ma yin no ces pa'o/_/de'i rjes su gsol ba gdab par bya
translated: After that, one should make requests:

original: ste/_sems can gyi don 'khor ba ji srid par mdzad cing rdzogs pa'i sangs
analyzed: ste/_sems can gyi don 'khor ba ji srid par mdzad cing rdzogs pa'i sangs
translated: I request the perfect buddhas, the bhagavān

original: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang de'i sras byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams
analyzed: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang de'i sras byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams
translated: and their sons, the great bodhisattvas,🔽to remain without passing into parinirvāṇa

original: yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs su gsol ces pa'o/_/de'i rjes su
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs su gsol ces pa'o/_/de'i rjes su
translated: for as long as saṃsāra endures.🔽After that, one should exhort:

original: bskul bar bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam pa de🔽ltar gang gi sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtshho zab mo las sgrol bar byed pa
analyzed: bskul bar bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam pa de ltar gang gi sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtshho zab mo las sgrol bar byed pa
translated: O bhagavān, tathāgatas,🔽please teach the unsurpassed, sublime dharma🔽that liberates sentient beings

original: dam pa'i chos ston pa bla na med pa bstan du gsol zhes pa'o/_/de'i rjes su
analyzed: dam pa'i chos ston pa bla na med pa bstan du gsol zhes pa'o/_/de'i rjes su
translated: from the deep ocean of saṃsāra.

original: bsod nams yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/_mchod pa bla na med pa bdun las gang
analyzed: bsod nams yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/_mchod pa bla na med pa bdun las gang
translated: The merit should be dedicated, and from among the seven kinds of unsurpassable offerings,

original: dge ba skyes pa'i thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du yongs su bsngo bar🔽bgyi'o ces pas so/_/yang na mdor bsdus pas bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i rnam
analyzed: dge ba skyes pa'i thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o ces pas so/_/yang na mdor bsdus pas bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i rnam
translated: the dedication should be made with the thought that all the virtue that has arisen is for the sake of perfect enlightenment.🔽  Alternatively, one can recite the verses that clarify the seven kinds of unsurpassable offerings in a concise way:

original: pa bdun gsal bar byed pa'i tshhigs su bcad pa bklag par bya ste/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bgyis pa yi/_/sdig gang rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan sngar bshags//🔽'jig rted gsum gyi dge ba thams cad la/_/rtag tu dga' bas rjes su yi rang
analyzed: pa bdun gsal bar byed pa'i tshhigs su bcad pa bklag par bya ste/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bgyis pa yi/_/sdig gang rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan sngar bshags// 'jig rted gsum gyi dge ba thams cad la/_/rtag tu dga' bas rjes su yi rang
translated: Whatever negative actions I have done with my body, speech, and mind, I confess them all in the presence of the victors.🔽  With constant joy, I rejoice in all the virtue of the three worlds.

original: ngo /_/dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu bdag skyabs mchi/_/rgyal bas gsungs🔽pa'i lam 'dir brten par bgyi/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can don
analyzed: ngo /_/dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu bdag skyabs mchi/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i lam 'dir brten par bgyi/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can don
translated: I constantly go for refuge to the three jewels, and I rely on this path taught by the victors.🔽  I request the buddhas to act for the sake of sentient beings, and I request the bodhisattvas to remain in existence for a long time.

original: mdzad gsol/_/de sras rnams kyang rtag tu srid pa ru/_/skye dgu'i yab rnams
analyzed: mdzad gsol/_/de sras rnams kyang rtag tu srid pa ru/_/skye dgu'i yab rnams
translated: I rejoice in the virtue of all beings, and I dedicate it all to the attainment of enlightenment.

original: ji srid srid pa'i bar/_/mya ngan 'da' bar mi mdzad bzhugs su gsol/
analyzed: ji srid srid pa'i bar/_/mya ngan 'da' bar mi mdzad bzhugs su gsol/
translated: I request you to remain until the end of existence.

original: dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug mkha' la gshegs pa'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa bzhugs so
analyzed: dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug mkha' la gshegs pa'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa bzhugs so
translated: The Extensive Sādhana of Glorious Lokeśvara Moving in Space🔽The powerful ones, in the same way, should perform

original: mthu chen ldan pa rnams kyis de bzhin chos/_/yang dag bstan pa de rnams
analyzed: mthu chen ldan pa rnams kyis de bzhin chos/_/yang dag bstan pa de rnams
translated: The teaching of the true Dharma🔽In order to quickly and easily cross

original: mdzad du gsol/_/gang gis 'khor ba'i rgya mtshho'i pha rol du/_/bde blag myur
analyzed: mdzad du gsol/_/gang gis 'khor ba'i rgya mtshho'i pha rol du/_/bde blag myur
translated: To the other side of the ocean of saṃsāra.

original: du 'gro bar bye ba'o/_/gang 'dir bsod nams rab tu mang skyes pa/_/de
analyzed: du 'gro bar bye ba'o/_/gang 'dir bsod nams rab tu mang skyes pa/_/de
translated: Whatever great merit is generated here,🔽I dedicate it all for the sake of enlightenment.🔽The victors, their heirs, the gurus, and all beings,🔽I myself, with all things,

original: kun byang chub ched du bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal ba rnams dang de sras dang /_/ bla ma dang ni 'gro ba bdag_/bdag nyid dngos po kun gyis ni/_/thams cad
analyzed: kun byang chub ched du bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal ba rnams dang de sras dang /_/ bla ma dang ni 'gro ba bdag_/bdag nyid dngos po kun gyis ni/_/thams cad
translated: I offer everything🔽at all times.

original: dus su btang bar bgyi'o/_/ces pa 'di rnams kyis mchod pa rnam pa bdun
analyzed: dus su btang bar bgyi'o/_/ces pa 'di rnams kyis mchod pa rnam pa bdun
translated: Having accomplished these seven offerings,

original: bsgrubs te/_om ah_mu_ mah_zhes pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/_/de'i
analyzed: bsgrubs te/_om ah_mu_ mah_zhes pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/_/de'i
translated: one should request departure with oṃ aḥ muḥ mahāḥ.

original: rjes su tshhad med pa bzhi po byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms
analyzed: rjes su tshhad med pa bzhi po byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms
translated: Later, the four immeasurables are loving kindness, compassion, joy, and equanimity.🔽

original: rnams 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas bsgom par bya'o/_/de la 'di ni byams🔽pa ste sems can thams cad la phun sum tshhogs pa 'dod pa phul du byung ba bu
analyzed: rnams 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas bsgom par bya'o/_/de la 'di ni byams pa ste sems can thams cad la phun sum tshhogs pa 'dod pa phul du byung ba bu
translated: Later, one should cultivate the four immeasurables: love, compassion, joy, and equanimity.

original: gcig pa lta bur brtshe ba'i mtshhan nyid can no/_/snying rje lta bu zhe na/_'khor🔽ba'i rgya mtshho mchog tu gting dpag dka' ba'i nang du lhung ba'i sems can gyi
analyzed: gcig pa lta bur brtshe ba'i mtshhan nyid can no/_/snying rje lta bu zhe na/_'khor ba'i rgya mtshho mchog tu gting dpag dka' ba'i nang du lhung ba'i sems can gyi
translated: The cultivation of love is as follows: One should cultivate love, which has the characteristic of wishing that all sentient beings have the highest possible happiness, like that of an only child.

original: khams rnams yang dag par gdon par bya'o snyam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'o/_/🔽dga' ba ci lta bu zhe na/_khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la gang🔽rnams legs par spyad pa de rnams la gus pa dang /_dbang phyug dang bcas pa
analyzed: khams rnams yang dag par gdon par bya'o snyam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'o/_/ dga' ba ci lta bu zhe na/_khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la gang rnams legs par spyad pa de rnams la gus pa dang /_dbang phyug dang bcas pa
translated: What is compassion? It is the superior intention to rescue the realms of sentient beings who have fallen into the ocean of cyclic existence, which is extremely difficult to cross.🔽What is joy? It is the mind of joy toward those who are well behaved in the three realms, who are endowed with power, and so forth.

original: la sogs pa rnams la dga' ba'i sems nyid do/_/btang snyoms 'di ci zhe na/
analyzed: la sogs pa rnams la dga' ba'i sems nyid do/_/btang snyoms 'di ci zhe na/
translated: What is equanimity?

original: khong khro ba dang rjes su chags pa dang rjes su 'brel ba rgyur byas nas phan pa dang ma phan pa'i sems can rnams la mchog tu phan par kun tu spyod pa'o/_/tshhad🔽med pa bzhi bsgom pa'i bar ma chad par chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs
analyzed: khong khro ba dang rjes su chags pa dang rjes su 'brel ba rgyur byas nas phan pa dang ma phan pa'i sems can rnams la mchog tu phan par kun tu spyod pa'o/_/tshhad med pa bzhi bsgom pa'i bar ma chad par chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs
translated: Having made anger and attachment the basis, one should practice the supreme benefit of sentient beings, whether they are helpful or not.

original: su dag pa nyid bsam par bya ste/_chos 'di rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis
analyzed: su dag pa nyid bsam par bya ste/_chos 'di rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis
translated: One should contemplate the complete purity of all phenomena by nature, without interruption in the meditation on the four immeasurables.🔽All these phenomena are completely pure by nature, by their own essence,

original: te rang gi ngo bos yongs su dag pa rnams te/_kho bo yang rang bzhin gyis yongs
analyzed: te rang gi ngo bos yongs su dag pa rnams te/_kho bo yang rang bzhin gyis yongs
translated: and I am also completely pure by nature.

original: su dag pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa la mngon du phyogs par bya'o/_/chos thams cad🔽rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa 'di kho na/_om swa b+ha ba shud+d+hasarba d+harmaswa b+ha
analyzed: su dag pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa la mngon du phyogs par bya'o/_/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa 'di kho na/_om swa b+ha ba shud+d+hasarba d+harmaswa b+ha
translated: One should be inclined toward such statements.🔽This complete purity of all phenomena by nature is stabilized by this:🔽oṃ svabhāva śuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāva śuddho ’haṃ.

original: ba shud d+ho ham zhes pa 'dis brtan par bya'o/_/'o na chos thams cad rang bzhin
analyzed: ba shud d+ho ham zhes pa 'dis brtan par bya'o/_/'o na chos thams cad rang bzhin
translated: Well, if all phenomena are by nature completely pure,

original: gyis yongs su dag pa yin na 'phral du grol bar thal bar 'gyur zhe na/_bden
analyzed: gyis yongs su dag pa yin na 'phral du grol bar thal bar 'gyur zhe na/_bden
translated: If it is completely pure, it follows that it is immediately liberated.🔽This is true.

original: mod/_thal bar 'gyur ba gzhan 'di yin te/_yan lag med pa'i phyir ro/_/
analyzed: mod/_thal bar 'gyur ba gzhan 'di yin te/_yan lag med pa'i phyir ro/_/
translated: However, there is another consequence: because it is without parts.

original: ga las zhe na/_yang dag par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/'khor ba'i rgyu
analyzed: ga las zhe na/_yang dag par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/'khor ba'i rgyu
translated: Why is that? Because there is no correct realization.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma rnams stobs dang bcas pa nyid phyir te/_chos
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma rnams stobs dang bcas pa nyid phyir te/_chos
translated: The cause of samsara, the stains of desire and so forth, are powerful.🔽All phenomena are that.

original: rnams thams cad pa'o/_/ci ltar de dang bral bar 'gyur zhe na/_khyad par du
analyzed: rnams thams cad pa'o/_/ci ltar de dang bral bar 'gyur zhe na/_khyad par du
translated: How can one be free from them?🔽By cultivating the special

original: 'phags pa'i lam bsgom pas te/_des de 'gag pas so/_/de nyid kyi phyir
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam bsgom pas te/_des de 'gag pas so/_/de nyid kyi phyir
translated: ārya path, because that stops them. For that reason,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stshal pa/_'gog pa mngon du bya'o zhes so/_/
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stshal pa/_'gog pa mngon du bya'o zhes so/_/
translated: the Bhagavān said, “Actualize cessation.”

original: de'i phyir chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'o zhes pa la
analyzed: de'i phyir chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'o zhes pa la
translated: Therefore, it is completely correct to say, “All phenomena are completely pure by nature.”

original: sogs pa'i tshhig 'thad pa kho na'o/_/ces pa mang du bshad pas chog go/_/
analyzed: sogs pa'i tshhig 'thad pa kho na'o/_/ces pa mang du bshad pas chog go/_/
translated: I have explained this extensively enough.

original: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa nyid la mngon du phyogs par
analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa nyid la mngon du phyogs par
translated: Having directed yourself toward the complete purity of the nature of all phenomena,🔽you should meditate on all phenomena.

original: byas nas chos thams cad bsgom par bya'o/_/de la 'di ni stong pa nyid te/_'di
analyzed: byas nas chos thams cad bsgom par bya'o/_/de la 'di ni stong pa nyid te/_'di
translated: Here, this is emptiness:🔽this is mere mind,

original: ni yid tsham kho na ste/_de dang de'i rnam pas rab tu gsal ba'i bdag nyid du
analyzed: ni yid tsham kho na ste/_de dang de'i rnam pas rab tu gsal ba'i bdag nyid du
translated: appearing as the nature of clarity in this and that form,🔽just as in a dream.

original: so sor snang ba ni rmi lam du ji lta ba bzhin no/_/yid las phyi rol gyi gzung
analyzed: so sor snang ba ni rmi lam du ji lta ba bzhin no/_/yid las phyi rol gyi gzung
translated: Apart from mind, there are no external objects of perception,

original: bar bya ba med cing /_gzung ba med pa'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa'i yid kyang
analyzed: bar bya ba med cing /_gzung ba med pa'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa'i yid kyang
translated: and because there is no object, there is no perceiving mind.

original: med do/_/des na chos thams cad yid kyi rang gi ngo bo can te/_de rnams kyi
analyzed: med do/_/des na chos thams cad yid kyi rang gi ngo bo can te/_de rnams kyi
translated: Therefore, all phenomena are of the nature of mind,

original: bzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa mtha' dag gis spros pa stong pa nyid te/_de
analyzed: bzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa mtha' dag gis spros pa stong pa nyid te/_de
translated: and they are empty of all elaborations of object and subject, etc.🔽This is the suchness, the ultimate truth.

original: kho na nyid dam pa'i don zhes par 'gyur ro/_/don ni 'di yin te/_gnyis
analyzed: kho na nyid dam pa'i don zhes par 'gyur ro/_/don ni 'di yin te/_gnyis
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: su med pa rab tu gsal ba tsham gyi bdag nyid du 'gro ba rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i mi
analyzed: su med pa rab tu gsal ba tsham gyi bdag nyid du 'gro ba rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i mi
translated: Nondual clarity is the nature of mind, which is the moving and the moved.

original: dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug mkha' la la pa'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa bzhugs so/🔽rgyu ba bsam par bya'o/_/stong pa nyid 'di kho na/_om shu n+ya ta dz+nya na badzra swa b+ha
analyzed: dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug mkha' la la pa'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa bzhugs so/ rgyu ba bsam par bya'o/_/stong pa nyid 'di kho na/_om shu n+ya ta dz+nya na badzra swa b+ha
translated: Extensive Sādhana of Śrī Lokanātha in the Sky

original: wa ata ma ko ham zhes pa'i sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/de'i rnyog pa
analyzed: wa ata ma ko ham zhes pa'i sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/de'i rnyog pa
translated: One should contemplate the movement. This emptiness alone, with the mantra Oṃ śūnyatā jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ, one should bless it.

original: bcas pa'i mtshhan ma la nges par grol ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i hrih
analyzed: bcas pa'i mtshhan ma la nges par grol ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i hrih
translated: On the signless moon maṇḍala, which is the abode of the pure white hrīḥ syllable,

original: yig dkar po shin tu dag pa la bcom ldan 'das dpal ldan mkha' la gshegs
analyzed: yig dkar po shin tu dag pa la bcom ldan 'das dpal ldan mkha' la gshegs
translated: the Bhagavān, the glorious Lokanātha in the Sky,

analyzed: pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug ston pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med par gyur pa
translated: appears like the stainless moon maṇḍala of the teacher rising,🔽with a body that is very white,

original: shar ba ltar shin tu dkar ba'i sku can/_mchog tu sgyeg pa cher gsal bas
analyzed: shar ba ltar shin tu dkar ba'i sku can/_mchog tu sgyeg pa cher gsal bas
translated: with a body that is very clear and very attractive,🔽with a body that is delightful,

analyzed: dga' bar 'os pa'i lus can/_rin po che sna tshhogs pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par

analyzed: gsal bar byas pa'i sku can/_ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa/_pad+ma dkar po

analyzed: rnam par rgyas pa lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i
translated: The Bhagavat Amitābha has eyes that are like the fully bloomed utpala flower.

analyzed: rgyal ba rin po ches spyi bo'i phyogs mdzes par byas pa/_bsil ba'i 'od can

analyzed: dang 'dra la rol cing dag par byas pa lta bur 'od gsal bas khyab pa'i sku can/ shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshhad tsham shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i chu skyes dkar po'i steng na
translated: He has a body that is pervaded by clear light, as if he were playing and purifying himself in the cool light.🔽He is seated on a seat of a stainless moon maṇḍala,

analyzed: gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnyog pa med pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i skyil

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das grub par byas nas de'i ngo bor bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi ngos su yang 'phags ma sgrol ma dang nor bzang

analyzed: dang /_thugs khar ku mu da'i gnyen gyi dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa'i steng hum yig
